resources.string: On first launch, or on first launch after changing language setting,\nrefreshing may take a while

Follow system/string> Light Dark Marine Old computer
Blue Line Console shortcut
Normal Skipped substring (e.g. "abd"
Launch Blue Line Console Notification icon always shown to launch Blue Line Console everywhere
Add Update Delete Close + -
Red Green Blue RGB (Red:%1$d, Green:%2$d, Blue:%3$d)
This setting takes effect after restarting Blue Line Console
Configuration URL Add URL Edit URL Widget commands Accent color Home screen Default items Add widget Widget License
General Appearance Launching apps Webpages and searches Custom commands Home screen Contacts Advanced About
Show help on startup Shows the guidance for help command. It is recommended to disable this option once you remember the "help" command Set as default assistant app To open Blue Line Console by long-pressing the home button anywhere, set it as default assistant app from the settings menu Always show a notification Always show a notification that can start Blue Line Console anywhere Text search matching style Theme When this option is changed, Blue Line Console restarts immediately. Accent color Animation Show icons Show package name Note: You can find apps with a part of their package name even if this option is turned off Webpages and searches Default search engine Always show a specific search engine on the bottom of list None Widget commands Home screen items Display results and widgets when nothing is input at home screen, when Blue Line Console is set to home app. Enable contacts search Enabling contacts search requires the permission to access contacts. You may be asked to grant the access to contacts. Notify English input to keyboard input software on command input window Command input window uses setImeHintLocales and sets to English locale. Behavior differs between keyboard input softwares. Set IME_FLAG_FORCE_ASCII flag on command input window IME_FLAG_FORCE_ASCII is intended to use ASCII characters for input. Behavior differs between keyboard input softwares. Accept arbitrary scheme for URL By default, Blue Line Console accepts only URL starting with http:// and https:// as URL input. By enabling option, other schemes are also accepted as URL input. Blue Line Console on GitHub Open https://github.com/nhirokinet/bluelineconsole Licensing information
Add custom URL or search engine Command name Display name URL Search engine (query is added at the end when enabled) Enabled Disabled Preset Varies with device language setting
Theme default Customize color Current theme (%1$s) does not support changing accent color.
Add command Add widget Select widget to add: Widget Command
Height (px) Minimum height: %1$d px Default height: %1$d px Configure the widget
Add widget command New widget command Save and select widget Command name Command name can be abbreviated Abbreviable
Dial: %1$s Email: %1$s
Invalid URL: must start with https:// or http:// and at least one more slash ("/"). Invalid URL: must start with <scheme>:// and at least one more slash ("/"). Invalid name: command cannot include space, and must not be empty Display name is empty
Error: Couldn't start command Error: Couldn't not open URL "%1$s" is not a launchable package Error: Couldn't connect to the widget
Unknown calculator internal error
Notification About the help command To show usage, enter "help" to see what to do. Don't show this message again
Data seems to be restored outside of Blue Line Console. 
 
Widgets cannot be migrated and are lost. Reconfigure widget settings from config if necessary.
You can input one of below list to search apps or commands. 
 
- Part of application name (e.g. Blue Line Console) 
- Part of package name (e.g. net.nhiroki.bluelineconsole) 
- URL (e.g. https://example.com/) 
- Calculation formula (e.g. 2+3*5, 1inch in cm, 1m+1inch, 1m+1inch in cm) 
- One of commands below (e.g. help) 
 
Available commands: 
 
- help 
- config 
- date 
- all_apps 
- cal [<month> <year>] 
- bing <query> 
- duckduckgo <query> 
- google <query> 
- wikipedia <query> 
- yahoo <query> 
 
The name for a search engine can be abbreviated. 
For example, "d somequery" is equivalent to "duckduckgo somequery". 
 
Network administrative commands: 
 
- ping <host>, ping6 <host>ã€€(only on systems with corresponding command) 
 
Other commands: 
 
- Color code (like #4d68ff) 
 
Hint: Set Blue Line Console as the default assistant app from Settings > Apps > Default apps > Digital assistant app or a similar menu, to make Blue Line Console open on long-pressing home button. 
Hint: Blue Line Console can be launched from notification menu by always showing notification. Find the option from the "config" command.
Licensing information
Blue Line Console is licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0. 
 
Blue Line Console contains code from the following library, which Apache License, Version 2.0, is applied to. 
 
- Android Jetpack 
- kotlinx-coroutines-android 
- kotlinx-coroutines-core-jvm 
- kotlin-stdlib 
- JetBrains Java Annotations 
- Google Guava
Apache License, Version 2.0
